solution.text:
Observe the pie chart carefully,
the students spends \(5\) percent of the total amount on wires.
Central angle = \(\frac{5}{100} \times 360\)
\(=_{{(Decimal(str(0.05)))*360}}_\)
Therefore, central angle of the sector for wires is \(=_{{(Decimal(str(0.05)))*360}}_\) degrees

content.text:
He was given Rs.\(_{j}_\) from his parents and he managed to save Rs.\(_{{(Decimal(str(0.15)))*j}}_\) from the total amount.
What is the central angle of the sector for wires?
